thread.title: Ritualists attack Islamic school, slaughter four
thread.title_full: Ritualists attack Islamic school, slaughter four

author: adekunle
title: Ritualists attack Islamic school, slaughter four
text:
Home » News » Ritualists attack Islamic school, slaughter four Ritualists attack Islamic school, slaughter four On 7:15 pm In News by adekunle Comments 
Minna- A village, Tungan Magajiya in Rijau local government area of Niger state was on Wednesday invaded by some suspected ritualists who slaughtered four boys in an Islamic school and made away with their blood. 
The rijualists who are said to be mainly out for human blood stormed the Islamic school around 3am yesterday and attacked five boys during which they succeeded in killing three immediately while the fourth eventually died few hours later while the fifth is in the hospital recuperating. adekunle
